questions: Q. 1. Who remarked “When France sneezes the rest of Europe catches cold” ?
Q. 2. Name the event that mobilised nationalist feelings among the educated elite across Europe in 1830– 1848.
answers: Ans. The Greek war of Independence.

questions: Q. 3. Name the Treaty of 1832 that recognised Greece as an independent nation.  Which treaty recognised Greece as an independent nation ?
Q. 4. What was the strong demand of the emerging middle classes in Europe during nineteenth century?
answers: Ans. The strong demand of the emerging middle classes in Eurpoe was freedom of markets and the abolition of state imposed restructure on the movement of goods and capital.
